runIntoMan.Body: You run into an old man who reaches out to grab you, and takes firm hold of your shoulders. You want to shove him off, but before you do, you notice his expression. He isn't terrified like the others fleeing around you, his expression is much more sad and desperate than that.\n\n"I didn't... I didn't know..." He gasps between breath. His frail voice betrays the iron grip he's now got on you.
